bibl.title: Papyri in the Collection of the Erasmus University (Rotterdam) (P. Erasm. I).
bibl.note: P. Erasm. I, 1-22. - Papyri from mummy-cart. (7 previously published). Fayum, middle of II B.C. - Texts dealing with transportation of grain to Alexandria will be published by Verdult in his PhD-Diss. in which he will continue the numbering of this publication.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes and Ph.A. Verdult, Papyri in the Collection of the Erasmus University (Rotterdam) (P. Erasm. I). (Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 21.)
Bruxelles, Fondation Égyptologique Reine Élisabeth, 1986, 8°, 61 pp. et 8 pll.

P. Erasm. I, 1-22. - Papyri from mummy-cart. (7 previously published). Fayum, middle of II B.C. - Texts dealing with transportation of grain to Alexandria will be published by Verdult in his PhD-Diss. in which he will continue the numbering of this publication.
C.R. par Carla Balconi, Aegyptus 66 (1986) pp. 283-284. - Hélène Cuvigny, REG 103 (1990) pp. 229-230. - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 57 (1988) pp. 487-488. - Dorothy J. Thompson, JHS 109 (1989) p. 246.
